label: Polygon
comment: A planar surface, defined by one exterior boundary and zero or more interior boundaries. Each interior boundary defines a hole in the polygon.

objectProperties.comment: The geographical object characteristic associated with this geographical grid.
A logistics location associated with this specified circle.

An interior linear ring specified for this polygon.

referencedBy.comment: A polygon included in this geographical multi-surface.
